item.description:
We'll meet at Darci's for Rose' by the Pool.

 

Please bring a bottle of your favorite Rose` and lets have another social evening.

Probably grill chicken and maybe some fish. Darci is accepting any food suggestions/ donations. Please contact her directly at:

 

dricker150@comcast.net The invitation will be sent to all wine groups but attendance will be limited to 25 people.

 

Please only RSVP to one Wine Group invitation.

Thanks,

Mike

group.name: The MetroWest White Wine Meetup Group

item.name: Rose' by the Pool
